title: Soda PDF 5 Pro + OCR v5.0.133.9133 (with Crack)
description:
Soda PDF
PROFESSIONAL

The Advanced PDF Solution
Easy to use and loaded with features, Soda PDF Professional is equipped to handle any PDF task. Create, convert, edit, secure and share PDF documents all with one application. Whether you are a home user, a large corporation or anything in between, Soda PDF Professional can help you save time and money while streamlining your workflow.


Key Features
Create PDF from: Word, Excel, PPT, html & 300+ file formats
Convert PDF to: Word, Excel, html, txt & image files
Edit text & images
ePUB compatibility
Annotate with: sticker notes, pencil tool, stamps & shapes
Secure PDF with passwords
Set permission levels
Create forms from blank page or template
Fill & save forms


1. Run "Soda_PDF_5_Setup_5.0.133.9133.msi" and finish instalation but don't run the Program
2. Run "Soda_PDF_OCR_Plugin_Installer_1.0.25.9129.msi" and finish instalation
3. Then Copy "Soda PDF 5.exe" from Crack dorectory to instaled folder (WIN XP 32bit "C:Program FilesSoda PDF 5" ) (WIN 64bit "C:Program Files (x86)Soda PDF 5" ) and replace it
4. Run it!
